mapper.select: SELECT A.* FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RN, D.*, MNAME FROM DIARYBOARD D, FRIEND F, MEMBER M WHERE (D.MID=M.MID AND DSTATUS = 2 AND MSTATUS = 1) OR (D.MID=F.FID AND M.MID=F.FID AND DSTATUS = 1 AND F.MID = #{mid} AND MSTATUS = 1) OR (D.MID=M.MID AND M.MID = #{mid}) ORDER BY DRDATE DESC) A WHERE RN BETWEEN #{startRow} AND #{endRow}

SELECT COUNT(*) CNT FROM DIARYBOARD D, FRIEND F, MEMBER M WHERE (D.MID=M.MID AND DSTATUS = 2 AND MSTATUS=1) OR (D.MID=F.FID AND M.MID=F.FID AND DSTATUS = 1 AND F.MID = #{mid} AND MSTATUS=1) OR (D.MID=M.MID AND M.MID = #{mid})
mapper.update: UPDATE DIARYBOARD SET DHIT = DHIT + 1 WHERE DNUM = #{dnum}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO DIARYBOARD(DNUM, DTITLE, MID, DTODOIN, DCONTENT, DHIT, DSTATUS, DDATE, DIP) VALUES(DIARYBOARD_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{dtitle}, #{mid}, #{dtodoin}, #{dcontent}, 0, #{dstatus}, #{ddate}, #{dip})
